General distribution. Central ASia ( UzbekiStan , * KyrgyzStan , TurkmeniStan , TajikiStan ); Europe (north to 62°), RuSSia (eaSt to IrkutSk Prov.), CaucaSuS, Turkey , KazakhStan , Mongolia .
Remark. In Central ASia thiS SpecieS iS recorded in the foothillS and mountainS only.
